main event: Eight objects, slightly larger than stars but brighter, were observed moving slowly at first, then very fast, before slowing down again over Berea, Kentucky.
interesting points: The objects appeared to change speed dramatically during the observation,No sound was reported during the sighting,The observation lasted for approximately 10 minutes,The sighting involved three witnesses,No photographs were captured of the event.
sighted object: eight bright objects in the sky
witness description: Mr. and Mrs. [REDACTED], and another individual who witnessed the sighting together.
